articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Nathan Lyon wins 'equivalent of a World Cup' in WTC Final - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia veteran Nathan Lyon watched on as teammates lifted two World Cup trophies over the past decade but finally tasted glory on a global stage in the ICC World Test Championship Final.
articles.content:
Australia veteran Nathan Lyon watched on as teammates lifted two World Cup trophies over the past decade but finally tasted glory on a global stage in the ICC World Test Championship Final.
